item.title: memtest æ£€æµ‹å†…å­˜
item.description: NAME memtest-setup - Install Memtest86+ into your GRUB boot loader menu SYNOPSIS memtest-setup [OPTIONS] DESCRIPTION memtest-setup installs Memtest86+ into your GRUB boot loader menu. It supports both GRUB 2 and GRUB Legacy (i.e. GRUB 0.9x). In case of GRUB 2 it installs GRUB 2 template into /etc/grub.d and GRUB 2 config needs to be regenerated manually by running grub2-mkconfig -o /boot/grub2/grub.cfg under root. This is not done automatically because it could overwrite any custom changes in /boot/grub2/grub.cfg. OPTIONS -h, --help Shows help. AUTHOR Jaroslav Å karvada <jskarvad@redhat.com> Manpage author.
